name: Mischievous mouse
description:
It's 1888, day of the inauguration of Victoria Hall. Just before the big ceremony, a mischievous mouse decides to steal the ceremonial key! Play as the little rodent and escape the guards who are trying to catch you. Platform your way around the backstage of the theatre, solving puzzles in order to escape, while also making time for some delicious cheese on the way out!

Game made by:

Games Art : JACK SYKES

Game Concept Art : DARIA TIRZIU, RICHARD STOKES

Programming and Design : PHILIP BAYLISS

Programming Aid and Sound : WILL BENNETT

(There is no current end to the game)
